name: Inspirational & motivational
description: Impel and motivate yourself with inspirational and motivational words from those who have experienced life.

name: Love
description: Whether it brings happiness and meaning or anguish and pain, love is an essential part of living. Love gives our lives contrast, for without it, life is a dull shade of grey. These quotes are spoken from both those in its warm embrace, and those in the sorrow of its departure.

name: Optimism
description: A positive outlook on life is key to overcoming hurdles and finding long-lasting happiness. Whether finding yourself in the service of others, seeking joy in small things or enjoying the beauty of the world and the kindness of others, these quotes inspire optimism.

name: Thoughts and dreams
description: Dare to dream. Find your inner peace. The wise words in these puzzles may help you to learn to know yourself better.

name: Other people
description: We all want to be treated with kindness, and a bit of humility gets you a long way. These puzzles offer some words of advice on friendship, kindness and compassion for your fellow man.

name: Family & friends
description: Many thoughtful writers have found that friendship and family is the most important thing in their lives. These puzzles share those thoughts.

name: Learning
description: Always be improving yourself and exploring new things. Don't take comfort in not knowing, but undertake action to understand the world around you. Education is the best investment you'll ever make: it's free and it's invaluable.

name: Work ethic
description: Work hard and reap the rewards. Being ambitious and determined will get you places.

name: Sorrow
description: In the contrasts of life there must also be darkness. These puzzles are words spoken as words of comfort by those who have suffered.

name: Depression & despair
description: Depression is a mental illness often gone undiagnosed and untreated. Once it grasps you, you're sucked in to a whirlpool of despair. If you identify with these thoughts, take action to talk to somebody. Sally Brampton's <em>Shoot the Damn Dog: A Memoir of Depression<em> is a fantastic read to take consolation that you're not alone in your feelings and there is hope for an escape.

name: Holidays
description: The holidays are a time to relax and be with family.

name: Art and culture
description: We find the culmination of human creativity in art and culture. These puzzles are on the thoughts of those who have pondered the works of others.

name: History and governance
description: Let us learn from our past so as to make our society a better place.

name: The seasons
description: Each season can bring something new. Explore these words by poets and philosophers on what might shore with the tides of time.

name: From literature
description: An assortment of quotes from literature.

name: From films
description: An assortment of quotes from famous films.

name: Funny
description: Enjoy some of these funny quotes. Don't look for too much meaning behind them!
